tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Udhayaraja & Dr.Jamuna Udhayaraja have been our family dentist for more than 23yrs. 
They are extremely knowledgeable & dedicated doctors, who always listen to our problems patiently 
& give us lasting treatment for our dental issues. Dr.Udhayaraja is a well experienced doctor, who 
treats even the most complicated cases and helped us to regain our confidence back. 
Dr.Udhayaraja's Dental & Orthodontic Centre is the best clinic in Chennai for all of your dental care & treatments.
Thanks to you Doctor & your team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Udhayaraja is a gem of a Doctor I have seen in Dentistry. This is our first visit because of our family doctor Dr Sabita‚Äô s recommendation to visit him. In about 30 to 40 minutes that he treated I enjoyed his 40 years of wealth of knowledge and experience because I felt he is a fine human more than a doctor. We polite, friendly, jovial . .
I these are truly the healing touch that he possesses and allow patients like me enjoy and appreciate. God bless him I will visit again and ask many of my people to visit him ONLY

tags: Value for money,
review: Firstly I booked an appointment with Dr. Preethi Udhayaraja and her consultation fee was 300. But there they said she is not available and her father Dr. Udhayaraja will see me. He did, and an assistant did scaling hastily for 15 mins, for which they charged me 1000   500 (consultation fee, which is 200 more than what I thought I was going to pay. I went there especially for refilling cavities. He said that 2 of my teeth have to be filled, and that they charge 2000 for each tooth, so total 4000 ! i did not go back to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,

tags: None
review:
********** ********* ********** The scaling was done very professionally and the analysis of the tooth structure was explained in detail in layman terms. Also, the technology used was very sophisticated - I could  see the improvement of the infrastructure (machinery) as compared to the last visit.

Dr. Preethi explained the XRAY with a greater level of details and gave genuine recommendations with lot more supporting information. Also, helped to adjust their schedule for setting up the follow-up appointment to fit my travel schedule.

Extremely happy with the outstanding level of service and totally satisfied with the scaling treatment and analysis report based advise.

tags: None
review: it was very good. The Doctor is very efficient. He gives special care to each individual. He is kind and gentle in his approach to the patient. He has the sufficient knowledge and experience in his field. He advises people if the treatment is not necessary. The price is also reasonable. He does not rush and he is quick in attending to the patients. He does the root canal treatment systematically. His care for each patient is commendable. I just tell my friends to go to him for any tooth problem. I have already referred three of them. They are also pleased with the treatment. I am also happy about the treatment I have got.

tags: None
review: Always a pleasure visiting.  Very detailed in their procedures and best in quality of service.  Some say, its pricey but every bit is well spent for the care, expert advise, quality and treatment with followups.  I had 11 fillings + 2 root canals in 2006 + 4 wisdom tooth removed.  Followed their advise in dental care and since only had 1-2 filling.  I once visited a dentist and never saw a dentist again in 3 yrs as I hated them.  After visiting Dr. Udhayaraj, I make my regular visits even year when I come to Chennai.  I like when I'm told the truth and facts about some procedures.  Feels safe and no repeating issues is a WIN!

tags: None
review:
Dr.U is a very good friend of mine for the last more than 25 yrs.So mine will be biosed.My daughter had a complicated treatment, success fully this week, travelling from BANGALORE to Dr.U's clinic; not at my instance.ON HER OWN & encouraged by her beloved hubby.It is to be noted that she has good friendly, well known Dentests are in Bangalore. 

She says, competance(of all Drs in clinici ...ncluding visiting experts), courtesy , clenliness,with a homely  very COOL atmosphere, etc etc are SUPERB.
reply_text: Thanks so much Balu for the lovely comment and recommendation. Its so sweet of you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I live in US and visited many dentist over 20 days in US. Dr Udhayaraja does better treatment than many US trained dentist. Facility is very clean and staff are friendly. The treatment plan for me was simple and outstanding. My teeth sensitivity problem was gone! Very satisfied!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Treatments are apt and very satisfying with no complaints.I can recommend any one to go to them for any. dental related problems.

tags: None

He is a great doctor who worksnon you with a smiling face and makes your smile better and confident. I wish him well akways. Capt Sanlaran Babu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Cleaning,
review: I absolutely adore Dr. Udhayaraja. He was so fatherly, kind, calm, and such a jolly character. I never did feel bad for the state of my teeth. He worked around my budget and thoroughly explained my condition, as well as my treatment plan. I was also tended by Dr. Venkat, and Dr. Prithvi, both of whom were par excellence. A special shout out goes to the wonderful Dr. Abraham who guided me well through my medications. Whenever I'm in Chennai, I'm surely going to visit Dr, Udhayaraja's practice.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Dr Udhayaraja has been my dentist for 7 years now and it always feels like being treated by family whenever I visit the clinic. Besides Dr Udhayaraja, I've been attended to by Dr Jamuna, Dr Preethi and Dr Prithvi recently and it's always been a satisfying experience. 

Thank you for keeping me smiling!

-Bhagya Ayyavoo

review: Good ambience and neatly maintained . Had a family atmosphere . My daughter had fear about the extraction but doctors friendly and caring approach gave confidence to my daughter . Qualified dental doctors also recommended Dr.udhayaraja . Not only Dr.Udhayaraja even his wife Dr.Mrs.Udhayaraja and daughter Dr.Preethi udhayaraja are like a family to us . review:
I was very happy with the entire  experience starting from the  professional curtsey  extended by the receptionist to the junior doctors examination and finally the senior doctors  communications   .  The senior doctor explained the complete concept and also gave me an estimate and discussed various options available for the problem. 
  What I really love about this place is that they dont make u do unnecessary tests and  make you spend a bomb on unneccessary  procedures ( like they do at apolo dental . )

Room for improvement: Would have liked to have a clearer break down/ explanation of charges.
